name: Makai Senki Disgaea 4 Return
description: Hit the cam-pain trail with Valvatorez, Fenrich, and the rest of the Hades Party as Disgaea 4 returns on the PlayStation®Vita system! Enjoy beautiful sunsets while Fuka complains about being stuck in her dream! Featuring 4 new chapters, it's time to travel back to where the promise all began!
